title: Great Studio floor plans at The Covington Apartments
posting_body: ['The Covington Apartments', '5800 American Blvd W', 'Bloomington, MN 55437', 'A wonderful home in Bloomington is waiting for you!', 'We currently have a gorgeous Studio bedroom 1 bathroom renting for $1475 per month.', 'This unit comes with 536 sq ft.', 'At The Covington we offer studio, one and two bedroom apartments that are bright, open, and modern.', 'Each of our units has grand nine-foot ceilings, beautiful plank flooring, private balconies, and oversized windows that capture the surrounding views.', "You're sure to enjoy the community amenities that make our property stand out from the crowd.", 'Our rooftop patio has a convenient grilling station and a luxurious pool where you can relax and unwind.', 'Reserve and enjoy our theater room or bocce court for a memorable Friday night with friends, or work out in our first-rate fitness center to stay in shape.', 'show contact info', 'Community Highlights:', '➢ Cardio Machines', '➢ Conference Room', '➢ Elevator', '➢ Online Payments', '➢ Pond', '➢ Pool', '➢ Recycling', '➢ Rooftop Lounge', '➢ Sundeck', '➢ Weight Machines', '➢ Corporate Suites', '➢ Fitness Programs/Classes', '➢ Kingsley Excellence Award', '➢ Pet Washing Station', '➢ Planned Social Activities', '➢ Reservable Clubhouse', '➢ Video Surveillance/Patrol', '➢ Wake Up With Weidner Continental Breakfast', '➢ Welcoming Lobby Areas', '➢ Yoga Classes Offered', 'Unit Highlights:', '➢ Floor to Ceiling Windows', '➢ Garbage Disposal', '➢ Maple Cabinetry', '➢ Plank Flooring', '➢ Sliding Glass Doors', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Sprinkler System', '➢ Stainless Steel Energy Efficient Appliances', '➢ Storage Space', '➢ Walk-In Closets', 'Contact:', 'show contact info', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Leasing Options:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Management:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'A56CC6D3E8D240']
